long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GuideStar, a website that helps people select charities, added extra information about charities associated with hate groups, using data from the Southern Poverty Law Center. Conservative groups protested this move, claiming that, for instance, groups that opposed same-sex marriage weren't necessarily hate groups.

This extension adds the information back to GuideStar. You're encouraged to click the links to SPLC and make your own decisions, but we think that more information is better, and many of the groups identified have viewpoints that are inarguably hateful.
